text: Enywe Abasuubili mulaloonda amaseenelo ka Shetani tawe, ne ulia uloonda amaseenelo kashetani , toto ye alomesinjia eshifwabi nende amabii, ne bukhayanga okhuba obulayi bwa Nyasaye nende tsimbabaasi tsitsie khwinye , shiyakhatswenulekhwo mwinywe kata mulala tawe, Halali Nyasaye atswenulanga owayenya ne Nyasaye ni omuwulili omumanyi muno
